4. Low dose inhaled salbutamol (LDS): A therapeutic regimen that involves administering a low dose of salbutamol through an inhaler.
5. Placebo (PI): An inactive substance or treatment that is used as a control in clinical trials to compare the effects of a new drug or treatment.
